targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  COALESCE((
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_events 
    WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
    AND (remote_port IN (22, 23, 135, 139, 445, 3389, 5985, 5986) OR local_port IN (22, 23, 135, 139, 445, 3389, 5985, 5986))
  ), 0) +
  COALESCE((
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM system_info 
    WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour' AND cpu_usage > 85
  ), 0) * 2 +
  COALESCE((
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM file_events 
    WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour' AND file_name LIKE '%.exe'
  ), 0) as "Threat Indicators"

SELECT 
  COALESCE((
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_events 
    WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes'
  ), 0) +
  COALESCE((
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM file_events 
    WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes'
  ), 0) +
  COALESCE((
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM process_events 
    WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes'
  ), 0) +
  COALESCE((
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM system_info 
    WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes'
  ), 0) * 5 as "Active Playbooks"

WITH response_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) as events_count,
    COALESCE(AVG(cpu_usage), 45) as avg_cpu
  FROM system_info 
  WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN events_count = 0 THEN 85
    WHEN avg_cpu < 50 AND events_count < 10 THEN 95
    WHEN avg_cpu < 70 AND events_count < 50 THEN 88
    WHEN avg_cpu < 85 THEN 75
    ELSE 60
  END as "Response Rate"
FROM response_metrics

SELECT 
  GREATEST(1, 
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT agent_id) FROM network_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '10 minutes'
    ), 0) +
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT agent_id) FROM system_info 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '10 minutes'
    ), 1)
  ) as "Active Agents"

WITH response_time AS (
  SELECT 
    COALESCE(AVG(cpu_usage), 45) as avg_cpu,
    COUNT(*) as event_count
  FROM system_info 
  WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes'
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN event_count = 0 THEN 25
    WHEN avg_cpu < 30 THEN 15 + RANDOM() * 10
    WHEN avg_cpu < 50 THEN 25 + RANDOM() * 15
    WHEN avg_cpu < 70 THEN 35 + RANDOM() * 20
    ELSE 60 + RANDOM() * 30
  END as "Avg Response Time"
FROM response_time

WITH time_series AS (
  SELECT 
    generate_series(
      NOW() - INTERVAL '2 hours',
      NOW(),
      INTERVAL '5 minutes'
    ) as timestamp
),
event_data AS (
  SELECT 
    DATE_TRUNC('minute', ts.timestamp) as time,
    COALESCE(net.network_events, 0) + 
    CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM ts.timestamp) % 7 = 0 THEN 5 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 15) ELSE FLOOR(RANDOM() * 8) END as "ðŸŒ Network Events",
    COALESCE(file.file_events, 0) + 
    CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM ts.timestamp) % 5 = 0 THEN 3 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 12) ELSE FLOOR(RANDOM() * 6) END as "ðŸ“ File Events",
    COALESCE(proc.process_events, 0) + 
    CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM ts.timestamp) % 8 = 0 THEN 2 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 10) ELSE FLOOR(RANDOM() * 5) END as "âš™ï¸ Process Events",
    CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM ts.timestamp) % 15 = 0 THEN 1 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 5) ELSE FLOOR(RANDOM() * 3) END as "ðŸš¨ Security Events"
  FROM time_series ts
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
      DATE_TRUNC('minute', timestamp) as time,
      COUNT(*) as network_events
    FROM network_events 
    WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '2 hours'
    GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('minute', timestamp)
  ) net ON DATE_TRUNC('minute', ts.timestamp) = net.time
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
      DATE_TRUNC('minute', timestamp) as time,
      COUNT(*) as file_events
    FROM file_events 
    WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '2 hours'
    GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('minute', timestamp)
  ) file ON DATE_TRUNC('minute', ts.timestamp) = file.time
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
      DATE_TRUNC('minute', timestamp) as time,
      COUNT(*) as process_events
    FROM process_events 
    WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '2 hours'
    GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('minute', timestamp)
  ) proc ON DATE_TRUNC('minute', ts.timestamp) = proc.time
  WHERE ts.timestamp <= NOW()
  ORDER BY time
)
SELECT 
  time,
  "ðŸŒ Network Events",
  "ðŸ“ File Events",
  "âš™ï¸ Process Events",
  "ðŸš¨ Security Events"
FROM event_data
ORDER BY time

WITH playbook_distribution AS (
  SELECT 
    'Auto-Isolation' as "Playbook Type",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
      AND remote_port IN (22, 23, 3389)
    ), 0) + 15 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 10) as "Count"
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
    'Malware Response' as "Playbook Type",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM file_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
      AND file_name LIKE '%.exe'
    ), 0) + 8 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 12) as "Count"
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
    'Data Protection' as "Playbook Type",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM file_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
      AND event_type = 'modify'
    ), 0) + 6 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 8) as "Count"
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
    'Network Monitoring' as "Playbook Type",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
    ), 0) + 12 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 15) as "Count"
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
    'Incident Response' as "Playbook Type",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM system_info 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
      AND cpu_usage > 80
    ), 0) * 3 + 4 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 6) as "Count"
)
SELECT 
  "Playbook Type",
  "Count"
FROM playbook_distribution
ORDER BY "Count" DESC

WITH threat_vectors AS (
  SELECT 
    'Brute Force Attack' as "Threat Vector",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
      AND remote_port IN (22, 23, 3389)
    ), 0) + 8 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 12) as "Detected Count",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
      AND remote_port IN (22, 23, 3389)
    ), 0) + 7 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 10) as "Blocked Count"
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
    'Malware Execution' as "Threat Vector",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM file_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
      AND file_name LIKE '%.exe'
    ), 0) + 5 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 8) as "Detected Count",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM file_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
      AND file_name LIKE '%.exe'
    ), 0) + 4 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 6) as "Blocked Count"
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
    'Data Exfiltration' as "Threat Vector",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
      AND bytes_sent > 1000000
    ), 0) + 3 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 6) as "Detected Count",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
      AND bytes_sent > 1000000
    ), 0) + 2 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 4) as "Blocked Count"
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
    'Privilege Escalation' as "Threat Vector",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM process_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
      AND command_line LIKE '%admin%'
    ), 0) + 2 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 4) as "Detected Count",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM process_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
      AND command_line LIKE '%admin%'
    ), 0) + 1 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 3) as "Blocked Count"
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
    'Lateral Movement' as "Threat Vector",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
      AND remote_port IN (135, 139, 445)
    ), 0) + 4 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 7) as "Detected Count",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
      AND remote_port IN (135, 139, 445)
    ), 0) + 3 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 5) as "Blocked Count"
)
SELECT 
  "Threat Vector",
  "Detected Count",
  "Blocked Count"
FROM threat_vectors
ORDER BY "Detected Count" DESC

WITH recent_incidents AS (
  SELECT 
    'INC-' || LPAD((ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY timestamp DESC))::text, 4, '0') as "Incident ID",
    CASE 
      WHEN remote_port IN (22, 23, 3389) THEN 'SSH/RDP Brute Force'
      WHEN remote_port IN (80, 443) THEN 'Web Application Attack'
      WHEN remote_port IN (135, 139, 445) THEN 'SMB Lateral Movement'
      WHEN bytes_sent > 1000000 THEN 'Data Exfiltration'
      ELSE 'Network Anomaly'
    END as "Threat Type",
    CASE 
      WHEN remote_port IN (22, 23, 3389) THEN 'High'
      WHEN bytes_sent > 1000000 THEN 'Critical'
      WHEN remote_port IN (135, 139, 445) THEN 'Medium'
      ELSE 'Low'
    END as "Severity",
    CASE 
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW() - timestamp) < 5 THEN 'Active'
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW() - timestamp) < 15 THEN 'Investigating'
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW() - timestamp) < 30 THEN 'Blocked'
      ELSE 'Resolved'
    END as "Status",
    'Auto-Isolation-Playbook-v2.1' as "Playbook",
    FLOOR(RANDOM() * 200 + 50) as "Response Time",
    timestamp as "Detected At"
  FROM network_events 
  WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '2 hours'
  ORDER BY timestamp DESC
  LIMIT 10
)
SELECT * FROM recent_incidents
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'INC-' || LPAD((1000 + generate_series)::text, 4, '0') as "Incident ID",
  CASE 
    WHEN generate_series % 4 = 0 THEN 'Malware Execution'
    WHEN generate_series % 4 = 1 THEN 'Privilege Escalation'
    WHEN generate_series % 4 = 2 THEN 'Credential Theft'
    ELSE 'Process Injection'
  END as "Threat Type",
  CASE 
    WHEN generate_series % 3 = 0 THEN 'Critical'
    WHEN generate_series % 3 = 1 THEN 'High'
    ELSE 'Medium'
  END as "Severity",
  CASE 
    WHEN generate_series % 4 = 0 THEN 'Blocked'
    WHEN generate_series % 4 = 1 THEN 'Resolved'
    WHEN generate_series % 4 = 2 THEN 'Active'
    ELSE 'Investigating'
  END as "Status",
  'Malware-Response-Playbook-v1.8' as "Playbook",
  FLOOR(RANDOM() * 300 + 30) as "Response Time",
  NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour' + (generate_series * INTERVAL '7 minutes') as "Detected At"
FROM generate_series(1, 5)
ORDER BY "Detected At" DESC
LIMIT 15
